title: Viktor Vasin - Wikipedia
text: Viktor Vasin Appearance Viktor Vladimirovich Vasin (Russian: Виктор Владимирович Васин; born 6 October 1988) is a Russian former professional footballer who played as a centre-back. Career [edit]Club [edit]On 26 April 2019, Vasin signed a new contract with CSKA Moscow, keeping him at the club until the summer of 2021.[2] On 22 February 2022, Vasin signed for FC Kairat on a contract until the end of 2022.[3] On 13 November 2023, Vasin extended his contract with Kairat until the end of 2024.[4] On 19 July 2024, Kairat announced that Vasin had left the club by mutual agreement.[5] International [edit]He was called up for the Russia national football team for the friendly game against Belgium on 17 November 2010 and made his debut in that game. Career statistics [edit]Club [edit]- As of match played 14 July 2024[6] International [edit]As of match played 14 November 2017.[7] International goals [edit]- Scores and results list Russia's goal tally first.[7] Honours [edit]- CSKA Moscow - Russian Premier League (2): 2012–13, 2013–14 - Russian Cup (1): 2012–13 - Russian Super Cup (1): 2013 External links [edit]- Player profile on CSKA official website (en) - Viktor Vasin at Russian Premier League (in Russian) (archive in English) References [edit]- ^ Воспитанники СДЮШОР "Смена" в профессиональных футбольных клубах в сезоне 2008 года и их школьные тренеры (in Russian).
